name: MKMultiPoint
desc: An abstract class that defines the common behavior shared by open and closed polygon overlays.

items.name: func points() -> UnsafeMutablePointer<MKMapPoint>
items.desc: Returns an array of map points associated with the shape.

items.name: var pointCount: Int
items.desc: The number of points associated with the shape.

items.name: func location(atPointIndex: Int) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Translates a point index into a unit distance along the shape.

items.name: func locations(at: IndexSet) -> [CGFloat]
items.desc: Translates a point index into a unit distance along the shape.

items.name: func getCoordinates(UnsafeMutablePointer<CLLocationCoordinate2D>, range: NSRange)
items.desc: Retrieves one or more points associated with the shape and converts them to coordinate values.
